column5: My company is aggressively hiring again. Looking for a Project Manager to coordinate environmental remediations in Thunder Bay. 2 years in the enviro/civil field would be the minimum. College or university an asset, just as much as good experience is. Client relation type experience is also an asset.  Lots of freedom (for fishing ) and potential for good $.  PM me and I'll forward you the job posting. Please not too many questions... the job posting will let you know if you want to apply or not.
